question: You are looking for a part-time job.Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letter,•	introduce yourself•	explain what sort of job you would like•	and say what experience and skills you have
text: I am writing because I am looking for a part-time job and I wonder if you can help me. Enclosed in this letter is my resume with further details of my previous experience and qualifications.

I graduated with honours from the University of Paulista with a degree in accountancy in 2011. Before moving to Montreal, I worked for twelve years at a multinational insurance company in Brazil. In this company, I had had a great experience in the accounts payable department where I learned all the routines including how to manage a cash flow. After that, at the same company, I had an opportunity to work in the payroll department as a coordinator since I took some courses related to payroll laws.

Currently, I can have only a part-time job, as I am studying business management at CSM College. I would like to work as a bookkeeper or even on the human resources team. I speak English, Portuguese and French fluently, also I consider myself a very focused person.
I am looking forward to hearing from you. I can be contacted at [email protected] at any time.
